_NOTE: THIS FILE IS DEPRECATED. n8n cannot have Form Trigger + Respond to Webhook in the same workflow (confirmed platform limitation, GitHub issue #21289). The workflow has been split into 3 files:

_FILES.workflow-1a-core-logic.json: Sub-workflow with all shared logic (Normalize → Claude Analyze → Build Issue → Create GitHub Issue). Import FIRST.
_FILES.workflow-1b-form-trigger.json: Form Trigger → calls Core Logic sub-workflow → Form Ending. For browser-based task submission.
_FILES.workflow-1c-webhook-trigger.json: Webhook Trigger → calls Core Logic sub-workflow → Respond to Webhook. For curl/API task submission.

_SETUP_ORDER: 2. Import workflow-1b-form-trigger.json → Open 'Run Core Logic' node → select the Core Logic sub-workflow from the dropdown → Activate
3. Import workflow-1c-webhook-trigger.json → Open 'Run Core Logic' node → select the Core Logic sub-workflow from the dropdown → Activate
